extendedInfo.description: Keep your green up and destroy the enemy invaders! Unlockable weapons and armor, endless gameplay, soon to become an online battlefield! Rate us, play and stay updated, its just a little now but I will be updating it, beta build and full online version available at convictcartel.com under gamesControls:Two Fingers on side touch arrows for JETPACKOne Finger on left and right touch arrows for DIRECTIONOne Finger on Bottom Touch arrow of JUMPTap the screen to SHOOT
